page.title: 13REVEREND AMOS- AN INTERVIEW
page.content: We interviewed our vicar, a kind and understanding person. He is the 8th vicar at All Saints, having been here for 7 years. He likes being a vicar in the Speke Parish, and when asked about his job he said.... "I try to help worshippers at All Saints to be good christians". Before coming here he had been at St.Christophers-Cheltenham,St. Andrews-Peckham, All Saints-Walworth, and Holy Trinity. He is married and has a baby son called David. His favourite hymn is "The Living Lord". He enjoys listening to Cliff Richard, Julie Andrews and Welsh music. If he had the chance to do something else he would like to work on radio or television. Written by Sonia Ely - 4T Stocktonwood Juniors.
